scenes.visual_description: Vibrant, digital comic book art style. Close-up on a woman's eye.  Her iris is a deep, shimmering emerald green.
Same style and close-up.  Now, a thin, golden ring encircles her pupil. The background begins to subtly swirl with soft pastel colors.
Zooming out slightly.  The golden ring now pulsates with light.  Feathery, iridescent wings unfurl from behind her, filling the frame with vibrant colors.
